posts.text:
Ætli þetta sé eins og með icee og matta... 

Annar skipstjórinn sá hitt skipið í speglinum og snarnegldi niður... bara "MOÐERFOKKING ÖKUNÍÐINGUR!"
Þeir hafa verið búnir að hægja alveg feiknarlega á sér. Svakalega lítið skemmd skipin miðað við stærðina og þungann.

Nada V / Grande Nigeria - Collision 
     VESSEL:     Nada V  
TYPE:     Car carrier 
GRT:         43,103 
BUILT:     1984 
VOYAGE:      Japan and other Far Eastern ports to Middle East and Europe 
CARGO:     1,653 vehicles 

  VESSEL:     Grande Nigeria 
TYPE:     Ro-ro/Container carrier 
GRT:         56,800 
BUILT:     2003 
VOYAGE:      Northern Europe to West Africa 
CARGO:     Around 400 Containers, cars and general cargo 

COMMENT: The two vessels collided head on at the entrance to Antwerp port (Nada V – inbound, Grande Nigeria – outbound), both ships with pilots on board. No technical reasons are suspected for the collision which at this stage is being attributed to a “misunderstanding” between the pilots. 

 LOF 2000 has been signed with Smit by owners of both vessels. 

The bows of both vessels have been severely dented but it is reported that no damage has been sustained to the vehicles on board the Nada V even though a severe list suggesting water ingress resulted in her being pushed against a sandbank. Cargo will be transhipped to another vessel. 

 As for the Grande Nigeria, she went aground following the collision but has been refloated.  Damage to her cargo is unreported.

Tekið af http://dolphin-maritime.com/casualty397.html
Vá erfitt að útskýra þetta fyrir yfirmönnum <<<icon_lol.gif>>>
eithvað nígeríu svindl í gangi eða?

Hvernig fara tvö skip að því að klessa á hvort annað???

Greinilega gott veður þarna nánast alltaf og skipin alveg huge í þokkabót haha
"þeð er ekki nóg pláss á sjónum fyrir okkur báða"
Skylineinn hans Guðna hefur pottþétt verið fremstur á þessu skipi <<<drunken_smilie.gif>>>
hahahaha eimmitt það sem ég hugsaði<<<icon_biggrin.gif>>>
